# Use R!

## Few examples

---

```{r}
rnorm(100)
```

---

```{r, message = F, fig.width = 9, fig.height = 5.4}
library(mapview)
mapview(breweries)
```

---

```{r, echo = F, fig.align = "center"}
seqx <- seq(0,10, length = 100)
par(mypar)
par(bty = "l")
plot(seqx, cos(seqx), type = "l", lwd = 4)
abline(v = 6, h = 0, col = "#3fb3b2", lty = 2)
```
